message.content:
1. The ŒDIPE trial examined the safety of an abbreviated hospitalization after implantation or replacement of dual-chamber pacemakers.
2. The ŒDIPE trial examined the efficacy of an abbreviated hospitalization after implantation or replacement of dual-chamber pacemakers.
3. The trial involved the use of a telecardiology-based ambulatory surveillance programme.
4. The trial was related to dual-chamber pacemakers.
5. The trial involved either implantation or replacement of dual-chamber pacemakers.
6. The trial examined abbreviated hospitalization after a medical procedure.

messages.content:
Statement: The ŒDIPE trial examined the safety and efficacy of an abbreviated hospitalization after implantation or replacement of dual-chamber pacemakers (PM) using a telecardiology-based ambulatory surveillance programme.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
